title: Skyrocketing Inflation Rates
description: In 2016, Venezuela experienced an inflation rate of 254.95%, one of the highest in the world, indicating severe economic instability.

title: Soaring Wholesale Prices
description: The wholesale price index reached 4005.10 in 2016, reflecting a dramatic increase in the cost of goods and services.

title: Minimal Military Spending in USD
description: In 2023, Venezuela's military expenditure was $3.92 million, one of the lowest globally, suggesting limited defense capabilities.

title: High Military Expenditure in Local Currency
description: Despite low spending in USD, Venezuela's military expenditure in local currency was 1.09e+22 in 2023, indicating currency devaluation.

title: Strong Real Effective Exchange Rate
description: In 2016, Venezuela's real effective exchange rate index was 741.70, reflecting a competitive currency value.

title: Low Rule of Law Ranking
description: Venezuela ranked in the 0.47 percentile for rule of law in 2023, indicating weak legal frameworks and governance.

title: Extended Compulsory Education Duration
description: With 17 years of compulsory education in 2023, Venezuela offers one of the longest durations of mandatory schooling globally.

title: Minimal Government Spending on Education
description: In 2023, only 0.92% of government expenditure was allocated to education, one of the lowest percentages worldwide.
